solution_line_template: You first have to calculate the total mass of apples he had on the shelves, so you add the three kinds of apples: {kidney_apples_kg} kg + {golden_apples_kg} kg + {canada_apples_kg} kg = <<{kidney_apples_kg}+{golden_apples_kg}+{canada_apples_kg}={total_initial_apples_kg}>>{total_initial_apples_kg}kg

Since he sold {sold_apples_kg} kg of apples, he still has: {total_initial_apples_kg} kg - {sold_apples_kg} kg = <<{total_initial_apples_kg}-{sold_apples_kg}={remaining_apples_kg}>>{remaining_apples_kg}kg
